thread.title: Everything in place at Mise en Place
thread.title_full: Everything in place at Mise en Place - Review of Asara Wine Estate & Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Heidi F
title: Everything in place at Mise en Place
text: I haven't stayed at Asara or done a wine tasting. But a dinner at the Mise en Place restaurant on the terrace (with an absolutely stunning view over their dam into the mountains) put Asara firmly on the list for another visit. Service was impeccable (very attentive but not obtrusive), food excellent and it was a lovely dinner all around. Next time I'll have to make sure to stroll around the premises.
